Title: Includes community centers with a religious affiliation in the definition of public place for purposes of offenses against public order
Summary: Includes community centers with a religious affiliation in the definition of public place for purposes of offenses against public order; includes falsely reporting an incident and placing a false bomb or hazardous substance in the definition of specified offense for the purposes of hate crimes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to including community centers with a religious affiliation in the definition of public place for purposes of offenses against public order; and including placing a false bomb or hazardous substance in the definition of specified offense for the purpose of hate crimes
